# Metabox

A little post meta framework.

**Contributors:** [tfirdaus](https://profiles.wordpress.org/tfirdaus)  
**Tags:** [metabox](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/metabox), [framework](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/framework), [backbone](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/backbone), [underscore](https://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/underscore)  
**Requires at least:** 4.7  
**Tested up to:** 4.7.4  
**Stable tag:** 0.1.0-alpha.1  
**License:** [GPLv2 or later](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

[![Built with Grunt](https://cdn.gruntjs.com/builtwith.svg)](http://gruntjs.com) 

## Description ##

A neat little post meta box framework built on Backbone.js and Underscore.js. You can run it as a standalone plugin or drop it into your own plugins.
